verses.verse: In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the son <WH1121> of Ahasuerus <WH325>, of the seed <WH2233> of the Medes <WH4074>, who was made king <WH4427> over the realm <WH4438> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>,

in the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427> I <WH1840>, Daniel, understood <WH995> by the books <WH5612> the number <WH4557> of the years <WH8141> whereof the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030>, for the accomplishing <WH4390> of the desolations <WH2723> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, even seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141>.
And I set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> unto the Lord <WH136> God <WH430>, to seek <WH1245> by prayer <WH8605> and supplications <WH8469>, with fasting <WH6685> and sackcloth <WH8242> and ashes <WH665>.

And I prayed <WH6419> unto Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, and made confession <WH3034>, and said <WH559>, Oh <WH577>, Lord <WH136>, the great <WH1419> and dreadful <WH3372> God <WH410>, who keepeth <WH8104> covenant <WH1285> and lovingkindness <WH2617> with them that love <WH157> him and keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687>,

we have sinned <WH2398>, and have dealt perversely <WH5753>, and have done wickedly <WH7561>, and have rebelled <WH4775>, even turning aside <WH5493> from thy precepts <WH4687> and from thine ordinances <WH4941>;

neither have we hearkened <WH8085> unto thy servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>, that spake <WH1696> in thy name <WH8034> to our kings <WH4428>, our princes <WH8269>, and our fathers <WH1>, and to all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>.

O Lord <WH136>, righteousness <WH6666> belongeth unto thee <WH1322>, but unto us confusion of face <WH6440>, as at this day <WH3117>; to the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063>, and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and unto all Israel <WH3478>, that are near <WH7138>, and that are far off <WH7350>, through all the countries <WH776> whither thou hast driven <WH5080> them <WH4604>, because of their trespass that they have trespassed against thee <WH4603>.
O Lord <WH136>, to us belongeth confusion <WH1322> of face <WH6440>, to our kings <WH4428>, to our princes <WH8269>, and to our fathers <WH1>, because we have sinned against thee <WH2398>.
To the Lord <WH136> our God <WH430> belong mercies <WH7356> and forgiveness <WH5547>; for we have rebelled against him <WH4775>;

neither have we obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in his laws <WH8451>, which he set <WH5414> before <WH6440> us by <WH3027> his servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>.

Yea <WH3478>, all Israel have transgressed <WH5674> thy law <WH8451>, even turning aside <WH5493>, that they should not obey <WH8085> thy voice <WH6963>: therefore hath the curse <WH423> been poured <WH5413> out upon us <WH7621>, and the oath that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God <WH430>; for we have sinned against him <WH2398>.

And he hath confirmed <WH6965> his words <WH1697>, which he spake <WH1696> against us <WH8199>, and against our judges that judged <WH8199> us <WH935>, by bringing upon us a great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>; for under the whole heaven <WH8064> hath not been done <WH6213> as hath been done <WH6213> upon Jerusalem <WH3389>.

As it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses <WH4872>, all this evil <WH7451> is come <WH935> upon us <WH2470>: yet have we not entreated the favor <WH6440> of Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, that we should turn <WH7725> from our iniquities <WH5771>, and have discernment <WH7919> in thy truth <WH571>.

Therefore hath Jehovah <WH3068> watched <WH8245> over the evil <WH7451>, and brought <WH935> it upon us <WH3068>; for Jehovah our God <WH430> is righteous <WH6662> in all his works <WH4639> which he doeth <WH6213>, and we have not obeyed <WH8085> his voice <WH6963>.

And now <WH136>, O Lord our God <WH430>, that hast brought <WH3318> thy people <WH5971> forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and hast gotten <WH6213> thee renown <WH8034>, as at this day <WH3117>; we have sinned <WH2398>, we have done wickedly <WH7561>.

O Lord <WH136>, according to all thy righteousness <WH6666>, let thine anger <WH639> and thy wrath <WH2534>, I pray thee <WH7725>, be turned away from thy city <WH5892> Jerusalem <WH3389>, thy holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>; because for our sins <WH2399>, and for the iniquities <WH5771> of our fathers <WH1>, Jerusalem <WH3389> and thy people <WH5971> are become a reproach <WH2781> to all that are round about us <WH5439>.

Now therefore <WH430>, O our God, hearken <WH8085> unto the prayer <WH8605> of thy servant <WH5650>, and to his supplications <WH8469>, and cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon thy sanctuary <WH4720> that is desolate <WH8076>, for the Lord <WH136>'s sake.

O my God <WH430>, incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241>, and hear <WH8085>; open <WH6491> thine eyes <WH5869>, and behold <WH7200> our desolations <WH8074>, and the city <WH5892> which is called <WH7121> by thy name <WH8034>: for we do not present <WH5307> our supplications <WH8469> before <WH6440> thee for our righteousness <WH6666>, but for thy great <WH7227> mercies <WH7356>' sake.

O Lord <WH136>, hear <WH8085>; O Lord <WH136>, forgive <WH5545>; O Lord <WH136>, hearken <WH7181> and do <WH6213>; defer <WH309> not <WH408>, for thine own sake <WH430>, O my God, because thy city <WH5892> and thy people <WH5971> are called <WH7121> by thy name <WH8034>.

And while I was speaking <WH1696>, and praying <WH6419>, and confessing <WH3034> my sin <WH2403> and the sin <WH2403> of my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, and presenting <WH5307> my supplication <WH8467> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430> for the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of my God <WH430>;

yea <WH1696>, while I was speaking in prayer <WH8605>, the man <WH376> Gabriel <WH1403>, whom I had seen <WH7200> in the vision <WH2377> at the beginning <WH8462>, being caused to fly <WH3286> swiftly <WH3288>, touched <WH5060> me about the time <WH6256> of the evening <WH6153> oblation <WH4503>.
And he instructed <WH995> me <WH1696>, and talked with me <WH559>, and said, O Daniel <WH1840>, I am now come forth <WH3318> to give thee wisdom <WH7919> and understanding <WH998>.

At the beginning <WH8462> of thy supplications <WH8469> the commandment <WH1697> went forth <WH3318>, and I am come <WH935> to tell <WH5046> thee <WH2532>; for thou art greatly beloved: therefore consider <WH995> the matter <WH1697>, and understand <WH995> the vision <WH4758>.

Seventy <WH7657> weeks <WH7620> are decreed <WH2852> upon thy people <WH5971> and upon thy holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>, to finish <WH3607> transgression <WH6588>, and to make an end <WH8552> of sins <WH2403>, and to make reconciliation <WH3722> for iniquity <WH5771>, and to bring in <WH935> everlasting <WH5769> righteousness <WH6664>, and to seal up <WH2856> vision <WH2377> and prophecy <WH5030>, and to anoint <WH4886> the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

Know <WH3045> therefore and discern <WH7919>, that from the going forth <WH4161> of the commandment <WH1697> to restore <WH7725> and to build <WH1129> Jerusalem <WH3389> unto the anointed <WH4899> one <WH5057>, the prince, shall be seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620>, and threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620>: it shall be built <WH1129> again <WH7725>, with street <WH7339> and moat <WH2742>, even in troublous <WH6695> times <WH6256>.

And after <WH310> the threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620> shall the anointed <WH4899> one be cut off <WH3772>, and shall have nothing <WH5971>: and the people of the prince <WH5057> that shall come <WH935> shall destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> and the sanctuary <WH6944>; and the end <WH7093> thereof shall be with a flood <WH7858>, and even unto the end <WH7093> shall be war <WH4421>; desolations <WH8074> are determined <WH2782>.

And he shall make a firm <WH1396> covenant <WH1285> with many <WH7227> for one <WH259> week <WH7620>: and in the midst <WH2677> of the week <WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice <WH2077> and the oblation <WH4503> to cease <WH7673>; and upon the wing <WH3671> of abominations <WH8251> shall come one that maketh desolate <WH8074>; and even unto the full end <WH3617>, and that determined <WH2782>, shall wrath be poured <WH5413> out upon the desolate <WH8074>.
